title: Hello, I cant seem to remove the popup preview of messages, such as whatsapp. Please assist.
content:
I cant remove popup preview from apps, such as whatsapp. I tried everything. Please assist. Its very disturbing when it pops up when im doing work etc. 

I would like to just have Blink Light, but i cant find the option to change this.

No matter what i change in the app, it doesnt applies. Its like there is some sort of master application that overrides these settings.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
